summary: The mask from Hei also known as BK-201
descriptionHtml:
Darker Than Black Mask
======================

The Mask from Hei aka BK-201 originating from the anime series Darker Than Black.

This mask comes in two versions where there is a complete and a broken version.
Both can be crafted under the ebony section requiring two letter straps and two moonstone ingots.

This mask perfectly fits together with Hei's dagger which can be found here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35962

Additional Notes
================

This mask makes use of a hair tint value therefore the hair will be the color you created your character with. (all variations possible)
The mask is rather thing so large noses or beards might clip through the mask so in case you'd like to change your characters appearance open up console and write:

showracemenu

Edit where necessary and exit the menu. The mask also only works on the human like races so not all are able to wear this item.

ID Code
========

To get the ID code for these masks simply open up the console and type:

help mask

Then more than 2 items will appear but you'll have to search for the "Darker Than Black Mask" and the "Darker Than Black Mask-B" item code, now simply write down the id code and add player.additem before it with then the amount you want so you can spawn it.

Example:

Player.additem 13000D62 1
